author: HemantMahawar
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
* Download and run the alpha 12 MSI installer from [releases tab](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v6.0.0-alpha.12)

Expected behavior
-----------------
The MSI installer screen says 6.0.0-alpha.12

Actual behavior
---------------
It says 6.0.0.12 :)
![pscore_alpha12_installer](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11988952/20196648/78c67c8c-a750-11e6-8db0-0b3a58c86218.PNG)
title: MSI Setup Wizard is missing alpha from the product name
